title: HSBC profit disappoints as CEO Gulliver bows out
text:
HSBC profit disappoints as CEO Gulliver bows out 9:50am EST - 01:48 
HSBC Holdings' pre-tax profit for 2017 more than doubled due to the absence of hefty restructuring costs incurred in the prior year but still lagged expectations as the bank took a writedown following U.S. tax changes. As Kate King reports, it was the last results report for CEO Stuart Gulliver, who steps down on Tuesday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
